trailer.name: Qake Gameplay Trailer/Preview
trailer.description: Qake is a retro-design game inspired by arcade and cell phone classics Qix and Snake. The goal of each level is to secure a certain area of the court without being hit by enemy bombs and balls.

keywords: retro, arcade, game, iOS, qix, snake, frogger, randomized level generator, infinite, random, randomized, random number generator, controlled chaos
description: Retro-design arcade game for iOS featuring infinite, randomized, dynamic levels.
name: Qake
